message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be of great value to you. I'm asking for $11,500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $10,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,250. Can you consider that?
